summary:
Ever had the feeling that daedric armour was too heavy to be practical?
did you ever wish there was a unique set of armour which looked and felt like it was made for a dremora, but still allowed you to run, sneak, etc...??? then this mod is for you.
descriptionHtml:
Ever had the feeling that daedric armour was too heavy to be practical?
did you ever wish there was a unique set of armour which looked and felt like it was made for a dremora, but still allowed you to run, sneak, etc...??? then this mod is for you.
it adds a location called \"Dovahkiin\'s Rest\", west of Riverwood, south of whiterun its a dungeon full of draugr, and its quite hard to beat...but when you complete it, you find the previous dragonborn, dead (obviously), wearing this great armour set.
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35152-1-1369117453.jpg[/img]
its lot lighter, stronger, etc, etc... than daedric armor....
its enchanted with blessing of talos, (cos well, dragonborn is supposed to shout a lot, right?)


give it a go, guys...


*crosses fingers*
*thinks:please like it, please like it*

[youtube]W3xjUPbDY2U[/youtube]


PLEASE NOTE: most of the screenshots show standard daedric armour.. this is because i took those while i was playing through the dungeon using daedric armour....
author: Daren
